title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 81.2 - Notice of receipt of application
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 81.2 - Notice of receipt of application

State Regulations

Upon receipt of such application and copies of the device, the Industrial Commissioner shall cause a notice of the application for
registration to be published in the New York State Bulletin. Such notice shall
contain the name, business address and affiliation of the organization making
the application and a copy of the device of such size as may be read without
difficulty. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
81.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
